markdownRemark.html:
I just updated to Iceweasel 3.5.6, and based on the start page, I decided to do an Iceweasel logo sketch:

You're now running Iceweasel 3.5.6

This page is mostly empty, and un-styled (mostly on purpose).

If you want this page to be better, translated in your native language, and/or more appealing to the eye, please send a message to the pkg-mozilla-maintainers list with your propositions.

Iceweasel needs your help!

There are many ways non-developers can help improve Iceweasel:

  • Draw a new logo,
  • Report bugs,
  • Help triaging existing bugs
    • Check if they still exist,
    • Find duplicate bugs,
    • If they are reproducible,
    • If they are Iceweasel-only or apply to Firefox as well,
    • If they are reported on Firefox bug tracker,
  • Enhance documentation,
  • etc.

There are many ways developers can help, too ;).

In all cases, you may want to contact the pkg-mozilla-maintainers list.
